title: Democrats: A Failed Center Right Party, Royal Guilty Pleasure 1.18.22
itunes:title: Democrats: A Failed Center Right Party, Royal Guilty Pleasure 1.18.22
description:
In episode 1065, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and writer Ellory Smith to discuss Oh cool, DOJ actually went after the Oathkeepers, Video Game Console Trackers are Helping People Find Covid Tests Better Than the Government, The Queen’s Guilty Pleasure Is My Pet Peeve: Guilty Pleasures That Wouldn’t Make Me Feel Guilty, The Scream Franchise Has Always Been Political and more!

  1. Oh cool, DOJ actually went after the Oathkeepers
  2. What Is Going On at Yale Law School?
  3. Video Game Console Trackers are Helping People Find Covid Tests Better Than the Government
  4. U.S. Government Reaches Agreement With Wario64 to Announce COVID Vaccine Availability
  5. Real Life Wario64 Tweet About Covid Test
  6. One Of The Best PS5 Restock Sources Is Now A Better Lead On Covid Tests Than The Government
  7. The Queen’s Guilty Pleasure Is My Pet Peeve: Guilty Pleasures That Wouldn’t Make Me Feel Guilty
  8. The Scream Franchise Has Always Been Political
  9. How ‘Scream’ Explored the Exploitative Nature of the Nightly News
  10. Scream returns — and takes toxic fandom to task


Listen: SAD GIRLZ LUV MONEY (feat. Moily & Kali Uchis) [Virgo Deep Amapiano Remix]

Steven Wilber's TDZ Photo

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
